title: Batata Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, International, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a separate vegan menu offering a variety of dishes. Also has fruit smoothies, of which some may be vegan, as well as a vegan ice cream and cookie sandwich. All items are made-in-house to order. Beverages include various coffees and freshly brewed iced teas.
